text: You have done well to reach this floor. I see much potential in your calculus abilities.
speaker: yung

text: They will defeat you and the Aureli Nation. Their calculus skills are immaculate compared to yours!
speaker: pythagoras

text: Quiet, Pythagoras. The Aureli Nation will prevail, the Calculus Chamber will be ours forever! With the power of differentials and logistics, you will fall!
speaker: yung
